MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G65 area of Kilsyth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:02am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a critical incident near Banton Mill and our team are currently awaiting access to our equipment. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:05am on Sunday, 24 January 2021
